data.name: Warface - Complete Tournament Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains permanent armor and weapons for all classes. All of the gear included in the DLC has been designed to deliver complete Warface experience and each item hand-picked to highlight class-specific perks and playstyles. Give it a shot!

Contains the following items:
  • Rifleman Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 70%. Increases head protection by 20%.
  • Medic Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 60%. Increases head protection by 20%. Regenerates 7 health points over time after 4 secs with no hits.
  • Engineer Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 60%. Increases head protection by 20%. Detects enemy mines.
  • Sniper Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 60%. Increases head protection by 20%. Detects enemy mines.
  • Open Cup vest - Increases weapon reloading speed by 10%, provides 40% explosive protection, 20% melee damage protection and 10 pt absorption.
  • Open Cup gloves - Increases accuracy by 10% and weapon selection/deselection speed by 20%.
  • Open Cup shoes - Increases speed while sprinting by 5%. Increases sprint distance by 50%. Delays claymore activation by 3 sec.
  • Orsis T-5000 - The Orsis T-5000is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at an international exhibition of Russian weapons. It offers high accuracy and extreme penetration power. Not even strong protective gear will protect sufficiently against a direct hit.
  • AP-84 Custom - The AP-84 Custom is a 4-burst round Polish submachine gun. It features a compact design, very good accuracy, high cyclic rate of fire and high damage. These characteristics provide the best way to make the easiest one burst kill to the upper-body or even hands.
  • The Sidewinder Venom - The Sidewinder Venom is a mag-fed tactical pump-action shotgun system. It is the upgraded version of the MSG 500 Custom and features include a forend which improves accuracy, a detachable grip with increased RPM, a Drum Mag to provide rapid reloads, and high ammunition capacity.
  • MSBS Radon- The MSBS Radon is a modular weapon from the Polish Military Technical Academy. MS stands for “Modułowy Systema" – modular system. The MS Radek remains comfortable to control even after long bursts, it's a weapon that's destined to become a staple of every self-respecting Rifleman's gun cabinet.

data.short_description: This DLC contains permanent armor and weapons for all classes. All of the gear included in the DLC has been designed to deliver complete Warface experience and each item hand-picked to highlight class-specific perks and playstyles. Give it a shot!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
